basic_info.summary:
After 18 years in the Oil industry, now I'm looking to persuit my initial
goal and passion in the IT field as a web developer. Team leading, analyzing,
developing new tools and strategies in order to achieve the desired goal, 
has been part of my formation, now it's time to integrate everything with 
new skills in coding to get my own personal goals.

experiences.company: Pilot Freight Services / General Electric, Miami
